Class AbstractCard

java.lang.Object
games.GameObject
cards.AbstractCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayingCard, UnoCard
public abstract class AbstractCard extends games.GameObject
Class that represents properties that any card will have. Extends GameObject. Each new card must extend this class.
